summary: The story of a hitman who kills for the mob, but on one job he falls madly in love with a girl, who happens to be the beautiful daughter of an associate.
cast: Sunny Deol|Karisma Kapoor|Salman Khan|Tabu|Amrish Puri|Alok Nath|Dalip Tahil|Mohan Joshi|Deepak Shirke|Johnny Lever|Ashish Vidyarthi|Arun Khedwal|Mitwa|Ibrahim|Rajeev Verma|Mahabir Bhullar|Kuldeep Pawar|Memon Mohsin|Shashi Kiran|Raju Delhiwala|Divya Bharti|Viju Khote
title: Jeet
